WRITING.TITLE: Tell me about an ancient family you know of..
WRITING.TEXT:
An ancient family that did amazing things, or perhaps not so amazing things.
Any notorious family assassins or superhero families out there?
Just joined this sub and the question just came to me!
Interested to hear some responses!
If you haven't approached him about it then he won't know! I'm a pot head myself and always try to talk to people about it!
Why is this still a thing? A know tradition and history are important, but if we can abolish things such as slavery, animal culling and many other things why is this any different?
I do the same!! Take out change, filter through and hand back haha
I need one more Shakespeare for the set, they are so pretty!
Nope, I know it's the rarest one though! Congrats you got it, I'm still looking for a judo coin to finish my Olympic collection!!
That would be an amazing idea!
Someone else is speaking sense!
Exactly I'm glad people are voicing their views the same as mine, I thought I was crazy for a moment with all the downvotes jeez
I know they would. The hive mind wins.. :(
It's worrying people think it's ok behaviour to teach..

Exactly! I've had pets all my life and you need to teach them manners. I don't want people pulling me around never mind dogs.
Thanks for the vote of confidence my friend!
Whoops haha

Show me where I said this is a dog attack, I am aware the dog is playing.
I don't understand why you fail to fathom why teaching a dog to pull a human is a bad idea?
If this dog is playing with a different child and happens to miss the foot and break skin on the ankle, what will the parent do?
The dog won't be taken to court and tried, it will be put down if reported.
Stopping this behaviour stops mistakes like that happening.

Show me where I said this is a dog attack, I am aware the dog is playing.
I don't understand why you fail to fathom why teaching a dog to pull a human is a bad idea?
If this dog is playing with a different child and happens to miss the foot and break skin on the ankle, what will the parent do?
The dog won't be taken to court and tried, it will be put down if reported.
Stopping this behaviour stops mistakes like that happening.

Pulling a toy and pulling a body part are two totally different aspects.
My father was part of the dog unit in a local prison and he has trained many dogs. Playing with a dog with body parts is not good fun. It will end up with a dog biting someone by accident who doesn't expect it and cause problems.
I'm laughing at the fact you think I don't care for animals, I have more compassion than you could ever imagine.

I've had dogs throughout my entire life and I can safely say one of my dogs has never pulled me.
Are you trying to justify that the dog pulling the girl is safe?
It's dangerous behaviour, the dog shouldn't pull, fact.
He doesn't even say anything about hands. Stop wasting a post and find something better to post on..

WRITING.TEXT: Title should be why, not why not.
Really? May have to slowly transition over to google music!
I know this, I just would like Spotify to enable you to toggle say perhaps a "safe mode" which wouldn't play any tracks labelled as explicit!

WRITING.TITLE: REQUEST : Explicit tracks
WRITING.TEXT: So I'm wondering if there's a way to filter out explicit tracks? Sometimes I have family over with little ones who I don't want to hear the swear words any way we could get a filter? Been using Spotify for years and would love this feature!!

Reckon we'll ever know who was responsible?
My first question is was it done by an individual who is trying out their hacking skills and succeeding, someone inside the UK or another country.. I'm not too sure and this worries me greatly. I seem to have lost all trust from the government entirely.
Someone tell me they feel the same?
That was nice!
Legalise it

When you are on the playlist pull it down to see the filter bar. Next to it is three lines, click them then recently added!
Been using Spotify for many years and this was by far the best thing they did for mobile!!
You can edit playlists in lots of different ways. I have mine newly added to be at the top!

WRITING.TITLE: So this happened to my motorcycle today. My footpeg snapped off, I hit a fence and it snapped clean off as I was walking it backwards to park. I've looked for replacements but only foot pegs come up, anyone help me? Regal Raptor NAC 125. Thanks!

WRITING.TEXT:
Isn't finding out about the politicians and their policies why we vote them into power?
Why would they withhold information so that it doesn't sway the results, also is there a time after where this information can be published say after the election?
Not really woah

We just use gluten free pasta!
Top ten meals
Spinach mushroom curry (coconut cream sauce) with rice
Homemade bchamel sauce with gluten free pasta and whatever veg we have on hand
Peanut veg curry
Soups chilies
Salads with whatever veg we have and then bulk it up with quinoa or lentils
Oats are really filling for breakfast (get the gluten free kind)
We live in the UK so we get lots of the Linda McCartney vegan sausages and burgers (not all are gluten free but a few are)
Allllll the potatoes (sweet potatoes, regular potatoes, mashed, cut up like fries, steamed, cubed, etc)
We make grilled cheese with vegan cheese and gluten free bread (lots of gluten free breads do have egg in them though so make sure to double check)
For breakfast my girlfriend also likes vegan yogurt with muesli
Yeah basically the staples of our diet are rice, pasta, potatoes, quinoa, lentils, any kind of beans, veg (frozen and fresh), coconut milk, tamari and nutritional yeast.

Instead of what? Just yesterday we had mac and cheese, day before stuffed peppers! Plenty of currys, burgers with potato flour buns, the list does go on!
If you want I can come back with a top 10 gluten free/vegan food she eats!
My girlfriend is vegan and coeliac and we never have an issue finding to cook!
Fellow vegan here, stop the self preach. Teach don't preach!
Cognitive dissonance look it up! Quite common!
